summary:
This mod prevents NPCs from becoming hostile when you\'re a stage 4 vampire. If you\'re already a vampire, you may need to remove and re-add vampirism via the console.

Unfortunately, this mod is not compatible with many other vampire mods because they both affect the same script file.

Please rate this mod if you enjoy/ike it!
descriptionHtml:
This mod prevents NPCs from becoming hostile when you\'re a stage 4 vampire. If you\'re already a vampire, you may need to remove and re-add vampirism via the console.

Unfortunately, this mod is not compatible with many other vampire mods because they both affect the same script file.

Please rate this mod if you enjoy/ike it!
author: bikrik
